name: SECRET SANTA  - 2 x 250g Single Origin Coffee
description:
TWO x 250g (Secret) Single Estate Coffees

From quality focussed coffee farms. TWO farms selected from our current portfolio.  

Complete with information and tasting notes.

We'll select TWO different coffees from our recent roasts!

Dispatched same day if ordered by midday.

SSsshhhh!  It's a SECRET!

Yip!  Merry Christmas!

name: DEAR GREEN PLACES - 3 Month Coffee Subscription
description:
THREE coffee origins in THREE months.

Dear Green Coffee Roasters source and roast freshly the best coffee beans available as a commitment to the quality and sustainability focussed speciality coffee industry. Allow our roaster to choose a different coffee every month in accordance with coffee seasonality and what is currently making us excited at Dear Green HQ!

Taste your way around the coffee producing world, from the zippy acidity and vanillin smoothness of South and Central American coffees to the delicate floral, lively and unique flavours of African or herbaceous notes of the Indonesian.  There are many origins and flavours to get through; we’ll choose our highlight of the month to send to you!   Packed straight from the roaster to a de-gassing bag and directly to your door step!

name: DEAR GREEN PLACES  - 6 month coffee subscription
description:
SIX coffee origins in SIX months.

Taste your way around the world of coffee or provide an awesome gift choice!

Dear Green Coffee Roasters source and roast freshly the best coffee beans we can as a commitment to the quality and sustainability focussed speciality coffee industry.  All of our coffees are fully traceable and are carefully selected from from farmers who strive for quality and excellence in the cup.  Allow our roaster to choose a new coffee every month in accordance with coffee seasonality and availability.

Our subscription offers:

1 x 250g bag of just roasted coffee with accompanying tasting notes and information on the producing country, the coffee farm topography, bean varietal and processing methods. Dispatched monthly for 6 months.

Packed straight from the roaster to a de-gassing bag and to your door step!

Freshly roasted and dispatched monthly to 1 UK address.

Colombia, Ethiopia, Brazil, Sumatra, Guatemala, Peru, Tanzania, Papua New Guinea, El Salvador, Kenya, India, Limu, Hawai, Rwanda, Bolivia, Sulawesi...

And repeat...!

name: COFFEE LOVERS - COFFEE BREW CLASS - The Hand Brew Basics
description:
KNOW THE ESSENTIALS FOR A PERFECT BREWED COFFEE!

Hario V60 Pourover - Aerobie Aeropress -  Clever Dripper - Cafetiere - Chemex 

The Coffee Lovers Brew Class is the first in a series of workshops created by Dear Green Coffee Roasters, designed to introduce and explore the essentials for brewing awesome coffee at home. 

In this two-hour class, we’ll discuss how to determine a coffee-brewing recipe.  We'll identify the appropriate GRIND SIZE, and establish the importance of brewing TEMPERATURE, DOSE, TIME, VOLUME and TECHNIQUE. 

Watch DEMONSTRATIONS of popular home coffee brewing methods.  

TASTE amazing coffees from Dear Green's current coffee portfolio.

Have hands on EXPERIENCE in coffee brewing basics.

DISCOVER which brewer and coffee suits each individual tastes.

TAKE HOME coffee  - 1 x 250g of Dear Green's freshly roasted single farm coffees!

The perfect gift for anyone interested in perfecting their coffee home brewing technique.

Please Email roasted@deargreencoffee.com to redeem your voucher and secure your place in our next class. 

Terms:  Vouchers issued with 6 month validity.  Payment is in advance of the class.  Cancellation is only permitted 24 hours prior to the commencement of the class.

All of our coffees are fully traceable and are carefully selected from from farmers who strive for quality and excellence in the cup. name: 'THE GOOSEDUBBS' Blend 250g
description:
Dear Green Coffee Roasters house blend is named after a city centre lane near to our Glasgow based Roastery.  One of the most unusual street names in the city, 'Goosedubbs' refers to filthy puddles (or dubbs') that geese hung out in in Medieval Glasgow bygone years!!   

The coffee itself is a full, rich and rounded espresso with flavours of caramel, chocolate and a balanced red fruit acidity.  It is designed for espresso based drinks and is a popular choice in cafes and restaurants that we supply.  It can also be reminiscent of those murky 'dubbs' when brewed as a cafetiere, offering a full flavoured filter coffee!

40% Brazil Fazenda Pantano
45% Colombia Villa Esperanza
15% Sumatra Jagong Village

name: Coffee Tamper - made by 'Knock' - for DEAR GREEN
description:
Ceramic Black Steel with Beech Handle

Available in 58mm or 51mm

With a surface strength up to 85% stronger than equivalent stainless steel this case hardened base is the product of controlled environment oxidisation and ultra heat treatment leading to a finish that is actually part of the micro-cellular structure of the steel and not just an applied layer. 

It produces a surface that is used in industrial bearing races and gearing mechanisms for its reduced friction and long life in high wear and tear applications.  As such it is used in the gunmaking trade and in the oil and gas industries amongst many others.

The finish has the same light diffusing, dense, soft-black of charcoal or soot - and is smoother than steel.

description:

name: USED COFFEE SACKS - Recycle - Create - Donate
description:
Help us RECYCLE, REUSE and SUPPORT one of our favourite charities!

www.coffeekids.org

You can help give something back to the coffee farms by donating a small amount and receiving a beautiful jute coffee sack in return for you to RE-USE or RE-CREATE!

Ideal for use on Helter Skelters and in Sack Races!  Or take inspiration from our pics on the left...

Sacks can hold up to 70 kilos and are from various origins.

Thanks for your donation!
